result.eng: Say it again please.
result.ga: Abair arís é le do thoil
result.orig: Abair arís é le do thoil
result.html: Abair arís é le do thoilSay it again please.
result.ponchtml: Abair arís é le do ṫoilSay it again please.

result.eng: Let's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ga: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.orig: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agat
result.html: Abair go bhfuil milliún euro le caitheamh agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.
result.ponchtml: Abair go ḃfuil milliún euro le caiṫeaṁ agatLet's say you have a million euro to spend.

result.eng: Say it in Irish.
result.ga: Abair i nGaeilge é
result.orig: Abair i nGaeilge é
result.html: Abair i nGaeilge éSay it in Irish.
result.ponchtml: Abair i nGaeilge éSay it in Irish.

result.eng: First of all, I must say that I am innocent.
result.ga: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontach
result.orig: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontach
result.html: Ar an chéad dul síos caithfidh mé a rá go bhfuil mé neamhchiontachFirst of all, I must say that I am innocent.
result.ponchtml: Ar an ċéad dul síos caiṫfiḋ mé a rá go ḃfuil mé neaṁċiontaċFirst of all, I must say that I am innocent.

result.eng: On Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ga: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.orig: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.html: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċoṁairle Ṫomáis aontaíoḋ gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.

result.eng: I would like to say something on this matter.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seoI would like to say something on this matter.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ar an áḃar seoI would like to say something on this matter.

result.eng: I would like to say something about that.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sinI would like to say something about that.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ina ṫaoḃ sinI would like to say something about that.

result.eng: I would like to say this very clearly.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléir
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléir
result.html: Ba mhaith liom é seo a rá go han-soiléirI would like to say this very clearly.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom é seo a rá go han-soiléirI would like to say this very clearly.

result.eng: What is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ga: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.orig: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.html: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaighWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leaṫanaiġWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?

result.eng: What does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ga: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.orig: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.html: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ponchtml: Cad a deir sé nuair naċ mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?

result.eng: I'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ga: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.orig: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.html: Déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ponchtml: Déarfainn go raiḃ níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a ḃí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: I cannot say that in the presence of the president!
result.ga: Ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráin
result.orig: Ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráin
result.html: Ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráinI cannot say that in the presence of the president!
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láṫair an uaċtaráinI cannot say that in the presence of the president!

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ga: Ní gá a rá go
result.orig: Ní gá a rá go
result.html: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ponchtml: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...

result.eng: We'll select a county, say Mayo, and do a documentary about it.
result.ga: Roghnóidh muid contae éigin abair Maigh Eo agus déanfaidh muid clár faisnéise faoi
result.orig: Roghnóidh muid contae éigin abair Maigh Eo agus déanfaidh muid clár faisnéise faoi
result.html: Roghnóidh muid contae éigin abair Maigh Eo agus déanfaidh muid clár faisnéise faoiWe'll select a county, say Mayo, and do a documentary about it.
result.ponchtml: Roġnóiḋ muid contae éigin abair Maiġ Eo agus déanfaiḋ muid clár faisnéise faoiWe'll select a county, say Mayo, and do a documentary about it.

result.eng: Excuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do ṫoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.eng: Say "please". - Please. - Good girl.
result.ga: Abair le do thoil - Le do thoil - Maith an cailín
result.orig: Abair le do thoil - Le do thoil - Maith an cailín
result.html: Abair le do thoil - Le do thoil - Maith an cailínSay "please". - Please. - Good girl.
result.ponchtml: Abair le do ṫoil - Le do ṫoil - Maiṫ an cailínSay "please". - Please. - Good girl.

result.eng: I am trying to say something to you.
result.ga: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leat
result.orig: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leat
result.html: Tá mé ag iarraidh rud a rá leatI am trying to say something to you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag iarraiḋ rud a rá leatI am trying to say something to you.

result.eng: You're interested in football, right? You could say I am!
result.ga: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil D'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuil
result.orig: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil D'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuil
result.html: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil D'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuilYou're interested in football, right? You could say I am!
result.ponchtml: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an ḃfuil D'ḟéadfá a rá go ḃfuilYou're interested in football, right? You could say I am!

result.eng: Do you say that often?
result.ga: An ndeir sibh é sin go minic
result.orig: An ndeir sibh é sin go minic
result.html: An ndeir sibh é sin go minicDo you say that often?
result.ponchtml: An ndeir siḃ é sin go minicDo you say that often?

result.eng: They say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ga: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.orig: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpa
result.html: Deirtear go bhfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gach grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.
result.ponchtml: Deirtear go ḃfuil gá le ceap milleáin ag gaċ grúpaThey say every group needs somebody to blame.

result.eng: I remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.html: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: It is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.
result.ga: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainn
result.orig: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainn
result.html: Is é an t-ábhar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainnIt is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.
result.ponchtml: Is é an t-áḃar is conspóidí i Meiriceá go fóill é déarfainnIt is still the most controversial subject in America, I'd say.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ga: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.orig: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.html: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí amú agat ó ċaiṫfiḋ mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
